channel.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
channel.description: kinda noob, but i just started a 508 not too familiar with them.. how do i make myself owner/admin?

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
item.dc:creator: @IceTICKER IceTICKER
item.description:
@IceTICKER wrote:

317 Makeing Your Self Administrator.

Your Source. / Find Charictors / Your Name / Find “character-rights” = 0 <-- 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner.

508 Makeing Your Self Administrator.

Your Source / Build / Data / Charictors / MainSave, / Find Your Account / Find “Rights:0” <-- 1 for mod 2 for owner.

I hope my little discussion helped.

Read full topic

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server

@minymo wrote:

These poeple are making it so comlicated all you need it go into main save find your chearector make sure you open in wordpad beacuse it will come up in a messed up code search rights and boom you need to change it to 3 no need to compile make sure you are not logged in

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“davidi2, post:5, topic:304050”]King… your a 508 coder… you should know that DOES work for admin.

But: Goto mainsave, and open your name with WORDpad and edit rights=0 to rights=2

For owner all you do is edit login.java AND commands.java with your name instead of the others.[/quote]

Sorry :s, I’ve switched to 317, working sheerly on memory and past experiences now.

But I remember it didn’t work for me when I tried it. o.O

Read full topic
item.source: {[508]} making myself owner on my server

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

King… your a 508 coder… you should know that DOES work for admin.

But: Goto mainsave, and open your name with WORDpad and edit rights=0 to rights=2

For owner all you do is edit login.java AND commands.java with your name instead of the others.

Read full topic

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“str pk3, post:3, topic:304050”]easy go on saved games and open ur name with note pad do crtl+f and put rights and change the 0 to 1 2

(note) only 1 and 2 cuz theres no 3[/quote]

That doesn’t work on 508.

Patsquare is right.

item.title: {[508]} making myself owner on my server
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

go to login.java in src/rs2/io and search for something like

if (p.username.equals("") { youll ee omthing like this

[ if (p.username.equals("") || p.username.equals("")) { p.rights = 2; } p.stream.writeByte(returnCode); p.stream.writeByte(p.rights); p.stream.writeByte(0); p.stream.writeByte(0); p.stream.writeByte(0); p.stream.writeByte(1); p.stream.writeByte(0); p.stream.writeByte(p.playerId); p.stream.writeByte(0); directFlushStream(p);
thenjust put your username into one of the “”
